title: Chamomile Roman Essential Oil
description: Chamomile Roman has a long history as a folk remedy for everything from stress to nausea. In aromatherapy it is used to calm the skin, body & mind.
cleaned_text: Chamomile Roman has a long history as a folk remedy for everything from stress to nausea. Roman soldiers were said to have used the oil to enhance mental clarity and courage. In aromatherapy practices Chamomile Roman is used for its soothing abilities, especially to encourage restful sleep. You will also find many uses for this oil in cosmetics, soaps, perfumes, hair and bath products.Uses of Chamomile Roman Essential Oil EuropeHistory and Background In Chinese medicine, yin energy, wood element. Helps release emotions linked to the past, dispels anger. When used on the throat area, helps expression of true feelings. Good for grief and emotional shock.
